channel.title: Agents on Leif Madsen.
channel.description: Recent content in Agents on Leif Madsen.

item.title: New articles coming soon!
item.description: I have vowed to try and write at least ONE article per week on my blog, even if it is quite short. I’m not sure I will be able to get to write an article this week due to some pressing consulting issues, but I’m still gonna try. If anything, I’m going to cheat and say this is my post for this week. How about I make a rule that says I can only cheat once per month?
